body.name: Acer Aspire 3 A314-36P-35UU Slim Laptop | 14.0" Full HD IPS Display | Intel Core i3-N305 Processor | Intel UHD Graphics | 8GB LPDDR5 | 128GB NVMe SSD | Wi-Fi 6 | Windows 11 Home in S Mode,Silver
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 14 hrs 34 mins
FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 10 hrs 49 mins
features: Purposeful Design: Travel with ease and look great doing it with the Aspire 3 thin, light design.
Ready-to-Go Performance: The Aspire 3 is ready-to-go with the Intel Core i3-N305 Processor—ideal for the entire family, with performance and productivity at the core.
Visibly Stunning: Experience sharp details and crisp colors on the 14.0" Full HD IPS touchscreen display with 16:9 aspect ratio and narrow bezels.
Internal Specifications: 8GB LPDDR5 Onboard Memory; 128GB NVMe solid-state drive storage to store your files and media.

The HD front-facing camera uses Acer’s TNR (Temporal Noise Reduction) technology for high-quality imagery in low-light conditions. Acer PurifiedVoice technology with AI Noise Reduction filters out any extra sound for clear communication over online meetings.
Wireless Wi-Fi 6 Convenience: Maintain a strong, consistent wireless signal with Wi-Fi 6 (aka 802.11ax) and 1x1 MIMO technology.

Improved Thermals: With a 78% increase in fan surface area, enjoy an improved thermal system and an additional 17% thermal capacity. Allowing for longer, more efficient work sessions while not plugged in.

Ports For All Your Accessories: 1 - USB Type-C Port USB 3.2 Gen 2 (up to 10 Gbps) DisplayPort over USB Type-C & USB Charging, 2 - USB 3.2 Gen 1 Ports, 1 - HDMI 2.1 Port with HDCP support, 1 - Headphone/Speaker/Line-Out Jack, DC-in for AC adapter
What's In the Box: Acer Aspire Laptop, AC Adapter and Power Cord
Operating System: Windows 11 Home in S mode
body.description: Choose the ready-to-go Aspire 3 with the Intel Core i3 Processors made for practical multitasking and productivity. With ease-of-use at its core, this family-friendly laptop is ready when you are. This Aspire 3 can tackle any job no matter how complex. Creativity soars to new heights with sharp, crisp visuals showcased on the 14" Full HD IPS screen, while the thin bezel provides you more space to work with wherever inspiration strikes. It’s the perfect companion to take with you wherever you go! (NX.KMKAA.002)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wireless Wi-Fi 6 Convenience Maintain a strong, consistent wireless signal with Wi-Fi 6 (aka 802.11ax) and 1x1 MU-MIMO technology. The strategic slot antenna placement helps maximize the portability and wireless performance of your laptop. Introducing Windows 11 Home in S mode Windows 11 Home in S mode is the one place for it all. With a fresh new feel and tools that make it easier to be efficient, it has what you need for whatever’s next. Less noise, clutter, or chaos. Microsoft reimagined the way a PC should work for you & with you. Windows 11 is redefining productivity

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for the price, but not perfect.
reviews.reviewText: this laptop is pretty nice for a low-end laptop in 2023. nice 1080p IPS display, long lasting battery, NVME ssd standard, DDR5 ram, etc. i thought it was a perfect replacement for my laptop, but it wasn’t (although good enough for my needs) i figured this laptop would be like other newer acer laptops in which it had some soldered ram and a empty ram stick slot. i purchased some extra ram to go with the laptop so i could play some games on it without worrying about going over the allotted memory. however, it only has soldered ram. the game i mainly play on it—plays fine on 8GB (FNAF security breach), but only when you have dedicated VRAM. after about a couple days of using this laptop the game crashed 4 different times compared to when it never did on my old laptop due to upgradable ram. the laptop works well for everything else and actually lasts throughout the day easily unlike my old laptop and even has a bunch of awesome features, but unfortunately that one drawback is a pretty big problem. i hope in the future their lower end laptops will have upgradable ram as thats the only thing keeping me from giving this 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Little Laptop - Once Broken from S Mode
reviews.reviewText: At first blush, this laptop seemed like a fantastic bargain given the price. But not realizing until it arrived, the version of Windows installed is in 'S' mode, which means all software must come from the Microsoft store. However, the Microsoft store doesn't carry or certify several common applications - like Adobe Acrobat Reader for viewing PDF files or Firefox if you prefer a different browser than Microsoft Edge. Luckily, breaking the software out of 'S' mode is relatively straightforward, however it is important to note that once you do, you can't go back. So, if you believe Microsoft should be the only source of software for your laptop, keeping it in S mode should be fine - and you can pass all the security worries on to Microsoft. Similarly, for security and anti-virus, the laptop comes with McAfee already installed and changing it while in S mode is nearly impossible.Beyond the operating system, this laptop is great. The display is medium-sized but clear, and the keyboard big enough that it is easy to use, but note there is no separate number pad. Performance of the laptop is outstanding with plenty of RAM (8GB of DDR5) and hard-drive space (128GB solid state drive). I use this laptop purely to surf the web and play puzzle games, and for that, it is outstanding. I have not used it for graphic-intensive MMORPGs or for more intensive business purposes like graphic design - I have other computers for those activities.I have not been able to get the touch screen to work, but again I'm not using any software that really requires touch screen use. There are standard USB 3.0 ports on either side, as well as a single USB-c port and HDMI port for connecting to a larger monitor. The integrated wi-fi connection works well, though the sound is weak and tinny. There is an output for headphones (or speakers) that greatly improve the sound from the laptop. There is an integrated webcam and microphone for video conferencing.Overall, this laptop has all the quality features needed in a laptop. So, for surfing or general use, this laptop is a great purchase for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A bit weak but well priced
reviews.reviewText: Right away here. This is a tiny bit underpowered going into the future. 8gb of ram on ANY device is not ok, nor is a 1080p display. However if you buy this to emulate cube/ps2/psp or play indie titles or older games at lower resolution, this isn't such a bad device. It could be a good first laptop for some one younger that also needs laptop use. It has a full OS in W11 but with S mode. Not much that matters for general use is missing.Screen is bright and colorful. More than usable even at a lower resolution. Keyboard and trackpad are more than usable as well. It runs fairly cool and quiet also. No signs of overheating or throttle while emulating. Wireless was decent too.Battery was a good few hours. I expect as low as 2-3 hours and as much as 12 depending on brightness and what you are running that day. Charges in under 1.5 hours to max.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Technology is moving so fast, our old laptop couldn’t keep up. This is a small but great laptop. Of course, understanding what you need helps. I just need something to connect to the internet so I can access my work portal. It is important for me that it’s easy and quick to set up and this was a no brainer. Up and running in about 15 mins with the laptop doing all the work. If you’re needed something for gaming and loading a lot of software on, maybe look further but for an everyday laptop that you can connect to a second monitor…this is really a great affordable option. I’d be happy to gift this to my teens as well for school work. Affordable to use for the basics.My star ratings are based as follows:5⭐️ - love it, can’t live without it. Outstanding and amazing.4⭐️ - pretty great, no major flaws.3⭐️ - got some issues going on.2⭐️ - pretty flawed product.1⭐️ - don’t waste your time or money. Just not worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for the price
reviews.reviewText: This laptop is good for the price. It's good quality, I used it for 4-5 hours straight watching streams and doing some work the other day and the battery level went down to about 35% from full. It seems like it has a good battery life and it didn't get too hot either. The specs on it aren't great but I expected it to be much slower than it is. It doesn't have a lot of ram but I didn't really have any major issues with it.I think it's a great little laptop for the price and the screen quality is good. If you just need it for light work (documents, things like that) and aren't trying to do heavy editing work or something of that nature that you'd need higher specs for this is great!
